description: This file configures an Axios HTTP client instance with interceptors for handling authentication tokens and error normalization. It provides wrapper functions for HTTP methods (get, post, put, delete) for use elsewhere in the frontend codebase.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified URL and returns the response data.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request with provided data to the specified URL and returns the response data.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request with provided data to the specified URL and returns the response data.

methods.name: del
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified URL and returns the response data.

ctags.name: del
ctags.pattern: /^export const del = (url, config) => api.delete(url, config).then((r) => r.data);$/

ctags.name: get
ctags.pattern: /^export const get = (url, config) => api.get(url, config).then((r) => r.data);$/
